name: Introduction to Sociology
description: Introduction to the field of sociology, including its history, methods, theories, and research. Focus on the major concepts and debates in the field.

name: Social Inequality and Stratification
description: Exploration of the forms and consequences of social inequality in the United States and other countries. Focus on social class, race, gender, and age.

name: Social Problems
description: In-depth examination of the social problems facing the United States and other countries. Focus on poverty, crime, addiction, violence, and other social issues.

name: Sociology of Health and Illness
description: Exploration of the social factors that influence health and illness. Focus on the connections between health, society, and culture.
